thing-type.label: ZEN24 Toggle Dimmer v3
thing-type.description: Toggle Dimmer v3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtManual or Z-Wave on/off and brightness control</li&gt <li&gt<strong&gtDirect 3-way:</strong&gt worke with regular on/off switches in a 3-way (neutral wire required)</li&gt <li&gtFully adjustable ramp rate for just the right on/off speed</li&gt <li&gtDouble tap to full brightness feature</li&gt <li&gt<strong&gtNEW:</strong&gt optional scene control</li&gt <li&gtRemembers and restores on/off status after power failure</li&gt <li&gtBuilt-in Z-Wave Plus signal repeater to extend network range</li&gt <li&gtWorks with LED and incandescent bulbs (don't use with fans or tubes)</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtToggle the switch up 5 or 6 times very quickly when adding it.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtToggle the switch down 3 times quickly</p&gt
